result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn M. Olsen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Sauk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
With huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before 6/14/2014.  EMP approved.  May serve in Dane Co on jail diversion program or any other county if accepted.
Consecutive to: any other sentence

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn M. Olsen

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shawn M. Olsen in court with attorney Debra V O'Rourke.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty O'Rourke states recs.  State agrees and moves to amend to Misd. THC.  Court grants amendment.  Atty O'Rourke pleads NC.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty and sentences.

Ct 1:  amended 
80 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence
To commence on or before 6/14/2014 at 7:00 pm
EMP approved
May serve in Dane Co or another county on jail diversion program if accepted
1 day sentence credit
Costs of $443.00 to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Shawn M. Olsen in court with attorney Debra V. O'Rourke.  Sue M. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty O'Rourke states matter will be resolved but needs reset to try and get EMP in Dane Co.  Bond continued.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
no controlled substances w/o valid prescription

Pre-trial conference on February 28, 2014 at 10:00 am.
Return date on March 13, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Shawn M. Olsen appeared by video means from LEC w/atty. Deb ORourke. Prosecuting Atty Sue M. Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  DE does qualify for PD representation.  State requests $500.00 Cash bond.  Atty. ORourke requests PA bond.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  Court sets $1000.00 Signature bond.  Special bond conditions as follows: No controlled substances w/o valid prescription.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 28, 2014 at 10:00 am.  Return date scheduled for March 13, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
